message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I believe a price of $925,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $850,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $850,000 is significantly below its true worth. I could consider letting it go for $900,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $875,000 for the product.
